meanings.definition: A live or recorded video broadcast over the internet.
meanings.sent1: I watched webcasts of cute animals playing online.
meanings.sent2: The company regularly uploads webcasts of their latest products.
meanings.sent3: The webcasts of dancing penguins made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter webcasts joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The webcasts of breathtaking landscapes were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: To broadcast a live or recorded video over the internet.
meanings.sent1: They webcasts their gaming sessions for their fans.
meanings.sent2: She webcasts her cooking tutorials every Sunday.
meanings.sent3: The magician webcasts his tricks to entertain his audience.
meanings.sent4: His voice webcasts across the globe, reaching millions.
meanings.sent5: The news channel webcasts breaking news as it happens.
